first_page_subtext: We Provide reliable and top notch services to our clients. We provide Data collection, Data aggregation, Data analysis, Data export, Access without internet and an easily scalable platform.

second_page.headline: What is Sebsib?
second_page.subtext: As you embark on your data gathering adventure, Sebsib is a data collection suite that can be of great assistance. First of its kind in Ethiopia, it can help you to utilize the tools on your computer and mobile phone to achieve your goals.

third_page.headline: Very Simple
third_page.subtext: Simplify your data collection with a brief training session and a straightforward approach.

fourth_page.headline: Made Locally
fourth_page.subtext: Tailored to perfection for Ethiopians, Sebsib comes with multiple dialects integrated into it, in addition to its ability to work without internet access.

fifth_page.headline: Unbelievable Pricing
fifth_page.subtext: No more need for foriegn currency as Sebsib provides high quality service with unbelievable pricing plans using Ethiopian Birr.

sixth_page.headline: Highly Secure
sixth_page.subtext: Through Sebsib, all information, data, and survey submissions are completely secure.

seventh_page.headline: Available
seventh_page.subtext: We are always available to provide training on how to use Sebsib and answer all of your inquiries.
